ComicInfo.Summary:
Maggie and Daffy go to the Huerta punk reunion with Hopey nowhere in sight. After meeting most of the old gang, Maggie leaves but then comes back. Doyle tells her he saw Hopey with the rest of her La Llorona bandmates. The indecisive Maggie steps out again, then comes back, finally seeing Hopey hanging out with Terry, Zero and Daffy.
The High Priestess inducts Zoe, Mila and Fritz Baby into The Holy Order. Danny seduces Baby. Fritz Jr. has been declared missing. Ulu tries to get Baby to take Fritz Jr.'s place. Pipo tells Fritz they need to talk.
Isla is chased by a Hellmet until it corners her in a cave and takes over her body, ordering her to go off and destroy Princess Anima.
Baby converses with Fritz. Surrogate mother Beverly tells Rosario that she hid her from Fritz when she was a baby because she couldn't let her go. Rosario goes off to meet Fritz Baby, her twin, as well as Fritz.
Chino, Killer and Amy talk Fritz-related gossip among other things including the Fritz imitators seen on the web. Guadalupe and Killer are at a movie cattle call where Killer meets Baby Fritz for the first time. Jimmy, Baby and Killer go to Fritz's seashore compound to what the drunken Fritz calls her MILF induction party. Later on, Efren, Fritz Jr. and Dr. Emil are arrested.
What Baby tolds the cops about Danny Chulo, how she first met him and his relationship with Fritz.
Isla and the amnesic Animus are holed up in a cave, on the run from the Interplanetary Space Police. After defeating a giant Batubuta, Animus flies with Lumina to an small island where they meet Katak. The Emperor of Blotos, Animus's father, summons the Hellmets after learning Animus is still alive and orders them to locate and destroy her.
Baby tries to get the Blubber Club Owner to hire her and then hooks up with Efren.
Isla runs to the seashore to meet Mr. Califa's son, who is coming back from shark hunting, but only sees Pota there. They swim to an unmoored boat off in the water only to find Mister Califas alone and nearly catatonic with his crew and son missing.
What Baby tolds the cops about Ulu, Vaca and Fritz Jr. in this story narrated entirely from her point of view.
What Baby tolds the cops about Dr. Emil and Efren as she gets ready to go live with her grandparents.
Tonta is back and living with Vivian. Comics-making friends Jennilee, Kim and Gwen bicker in the forest and leave in a huff. Angel chats with Vivian while Tonta lies awake on the couch.
Mila and her promoter Efren visit Ulu in his film production office. Later on, Mila and Ulu go to the Blubber Club and meet Pupusi.
The concluding chapter in this Fritz B-movie, later on in the book revealed to have been filmed six years earlier. Jasmin and Circe vie for control of the magic lamp, but only the combined forces of Aladdin, Morgana, Missy and Professor Enigma turn the tide.
Lumina accidentally smuggles Animus into the pirate spaceship after harvesting some space minerals. The ship is then intercepted and gassed by the Interplanetary Space Police, who take Lumina and crew (and a hidden Animus) to prison.

ComicInfo.Title: I Guess I Forgot to Stand Pigeon-Toed; Talent 11; Talent 10; Talent 9; Talent 8; Princess Amnesia; Talent 7; Isla Guerra; Talent 6; Talent 5; Talent 4; The Magic Voyage of Aladdin [Chapters 4-6]
